name: Find broken url
author: Nitea AB (Claes Norén)

sections.description:
This plugin finds all URL´s in your post and postmeta table in your database and test if they work.
No works with Gutenberg

Features

  • Monitors URL´s in your posts, pages and all other post types.
  • Find url that don’t respond with status 200

Basic Usage

Once installed the plugin starts checking your post and postmeta table for URL´s that is broken.
You can manually start it in the plugin tab.

Translations

  • Swedish – classano
sections.installation:
To do a new installation of the plugin, please follow these steps

  1. Download the find-broken-url.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Upload find-broken-url folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
